result.execSummary:
The defendant Calvin Dershawn Carothers Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Felon Use Oleoresin Device, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.26(4)(L).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 4 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Calvin Dershawn Carothers Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Calvin D Carothers in court.  Chris D Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Plea - G.
BTC: GUILTY.    Repeater enhancer removed.
$200+cc+DNA, pp $25/mo beg 3-1-16, ftp 4 days RCJ for contempt.

Defendant Calvin D Carothers in court, in custody.  Chris D Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Deft is in custody on another matter.
State extended an offer to the deft at the pre-trial.
Deft wants to take advantage of the offer.
Deft indicates he thinks he will be getting out on Friday.
Deft would like to contact the SPD's office.
BTC: Matter adjourned. Attorney information given to defendant.  Status conference scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 11-19-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 12-22-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Calvin D Carothers in court.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 19, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for December 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
